body.name: AFAIF Metal File Cabinets, Lateral Filing Cabinet with 2 Drawers,70" H File Cabinet for Home Office, Office Storage Cabinet with Adjustable Storage Shelves for Letter/Legal/A4 Size Files,White
features: 【2 in 1 File Cabinet】▶AFAIF filing cabinet combines 2 adjustable storage shelves and 2 large drawers, which makes it a large capacity. The upper part of the storage cabinet can be used for files, books, documents, file boxes, etc. And both lower drawers have removable hanging rods for you to sort out all your letters, legal, A4, or F4 size to meet the storage needs of different types of documents and files.

【with Adjustable Shelves】▶70"Tall office file cabinet with adjustable shelves. As the two shelves in the storage cabinet are adjustable there have three small storage spaces, you can decide the size of the storage space according to the height and size of the items, providing adaptability and convenience.

【Security Locking System】▶The filing cabinet has a security and safety lock system, one lock can lock the upper storage cabinet, and another lock can lock all two drawers. With 2 locks, it can help you keep your valuables and documents safe, such as contracts, receipts, cards, certificates, meeting materials, passports, etc.

【Heavy Duty Structure】▶With a steel firm structure and powder coating surface process, which will prevent the file cabinet from being rusted and scratched. The simple and large capacity design makes this lockable metal cabinet to be widely used in offices, garages, basements, shops, homes, kitchens, warehouses, school classrooms, or anywhere secure storage space is required.

【Assembly Required 】▶This office storage cabinet needs to be assembled by yourself, comes with all hardware and necessary tools, and easy-to-follow instructions. If the office storage cabinet arrives damaged, scratched, or missing part, or any Installation problems, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: Features of Our Filing Cabinet : The all-metal file cabinet has heavy-duty welded steel construction and is sturdy that each shelf can hold up to 120 LBS, and each drawer can hold up to 50 LBSWater-resistant, Scratch-resistant, Easy to clean,2 adjustable shelves for easy adjustment or removal. Suitable for storage of various height items.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose AFAIF File Cabinet Storage Combos? AFAIF is a professional metal cabinet seller with a factory. The metal storage cabinet is made of solid metal, which makes the cabinet extremely sturdy and durable. With a locking design and 2 lockable drawers, you get a secure space to store your private belongings.
The perfect decoration of office furniture,practical filing cabinets for home office

Features of Our Filing Cabinet : The all-metal file cabinet has heavy-duty welded steel construction and is sturdy that each shelf can hold up to 120 LBS, and each drawer can hold up to 50 LBSWater-resistant, Scratch-resistant, Easy to clean,2 adjustable shelves for easy adjustment or removal. Suitable for storage of various height items. Specification of metal cabinet Color: White Lockable: Yes Size of Document: Letter/Legal/A4 Dimension:15.7"D x 31.5"W x 70"H Drawer size:15.7" D x 30" W x 11.8" H Product Weight: 96 pounds

Lock System with 2 keys The storage cabinet uses a locking system to keep your files, documents, or tools safe. The upper storage cabinet has 1 lock and the Lower drawer also has 1 lock, each lock comes with two keys to prevent loss. 2 Adjustable Shelves The height of the 3 compartments can be adjusted freely to suit items from small to large, it provide adaptability and convenience for your storage. Full-Extension silent slide rail This office storage cabinet with noise-free ball bearing slides provides you easy access to opening and closing. It will not disturb other people while working. Comes with 2 drawers Each drawer has adjustable hanging bars for A4/Letter/Legal Size File Folders. It is very practical and useful for storage. In addition, it just can open one drawer at a time, which means that you can't open 2 drawers at the same time which can prevent tipping
It is not only suitable for home offices but also garages, warehouses, schools, bedrooms, living rooms, and other places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I’d read a lot of reviews on lateral files. Either they are relatively cheap with complicated assembly or very expensive but pre-built. I took a gamble on this item, and have been pleasantly surprised. Came very well package, but it is a very heavy box. I assembled it without by myself, taking care to understand the instructions.Took me about 2hrs from unpacking to finish. One key to the assembly is when the drawers are placed on the rails, you do have to push down on each side to click/lock them in place. Final product is excellent, robust and much better than I expected. One nice benefit is that if you’re storing letter files, you can arrange them left to right, and use the full width of the drawer with no gaps. This allows for many more files and no loss of space than arranging them front to back. Of course its early days and we will see how this holds up with use, but for now, very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and fits my needs but lock broke
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly what I was looking for. Shelves are adjustable height and appear sturdy (they currently hold books and papers). The color is more of a grey white than pure white. Assembly was a bit involved. I may order the other model. I wish it came with both left and right side 2 drawer options. Unfortunately the locking mechanism inside broke after a week, which is why I’m taking off a star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plenty of space.
reviews.reviewText: This is my fourth storage unit from AFAIF. All good quality and arrived with no shipping damage.Pros:Plenty of space with easy access for my hobby supplies.Cons:Had great hopes for the peg board sides, but the holes are square and require a special peg. It came with a couple but extras or different sizes are expensive in the range of $7 each peg/hook. Not a deal breaker as the steel construction means magnetic accessories work just as well as their pegs.Haven't decided to put the doors on yet as once the go on they don't come off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice. Easy to assemble.. it arrived with minor damages maybe from delivery I reached out to the seller showed pic after I put it together... seller took of a small percentage off the price and he was very prompt getting back to me ... it's worth the buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice office cabinet
reviews.reviewText: Need two people to assemble it. Don’t think I would buy another though. Wasn’t easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy Handsome Double File Cabinet with 2 shelves & solid top.
reviews.reviewText: Great manufacturer to deal with as they promptly return all calls & email inquiries.Assembled on my own and had to turn over against directions for easier screw hole access. That said, many holes are hard to navigate and sometimes too small for the screws especially the rear panel. My major complaint is that when inserting or taking out a Pentaflex file the space is not wide enough resulting in bending of the file-not a deal breaker. Had many types/styles of file cabinets over the years but this one has ease of access to files as the drawers open & shut rather well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and very usable
reviews.reviewText: Difficult to assemble. Many screw holes had to be red rolled in order to assemble
